website_summaries.verdict: A good fully functional gaming controller for Android smartphones with easy setup.
pros: Built-in cradle holds many types of smartphones with little adjustment
Button layout is similar to other common controllers
Connecting the controller only requires a few seconds
cons: Phone cradle can move and sway while playing games, making the phone feel loose

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love it, but often the analog would not work correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it. The analog was incredibly comfortable, so I thought I'd take it on my 12 hour flight to Japan. After having used it for only a few hours, it would often force the analog to constantly push the character left, up, or some combination of the two. I'd disconnect and sync again, but after a few minutes I would once again not have control in whichever game I was playing. Maybe I got a dud?
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it worked.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this about two days now. And the sticks are actually not bad, the buttons are good too and it is light weight is why some may say it feels cheap. The L2/R2 buttons are in a weird spot but it's not bad at all. Don't use this laying down your phone will swing forward. Now for the bad. The L2/R2 button and A button are intermittent for me. For example go to shoot in game the first shot will fire and I have to press RELEASE a dozen times before it will shoot again. Not sure if it is having signal or button issues. I am using a Google pixel XL.
customer_reviews.author: USMCSurvivalist85

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Mobile Controller
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. Battery life is great, it feels like a AAA controller, and it even has clickable joysticks which is above and beyond expectations for a mobile controller. It has all the buttons and functionality of a full sized console controller and pairs to my OnePlus Two with no problem. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Blatz

customer_reviews.title: I must be dumb...
customer_reviews.text: Is this for real? The app needs to be force closed. the website says I'ma winner! The buttons seem to randomly assign the mapping each time paired. Wont pair to my W10 PC. Isnt recognized via USB. I got this to Minecraft with, eventually hoped to use with the Samsung VR version, but if i cant use it with my phone in a reliable fashion how will i be able to use it blind? As a gulton for punishment, i will continue to try to get this working, if that happens I will revise my rating but meanwhile I cannot recommend...
customer_reviews.author: twedelc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my commutes.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my daily commute, to play android games on my phone. Connects quickly via bluetooth, no noticeable input lag. Its not the most comfortable controller I own, but is really easy to use and pack away in my bag, so its a nice compromise. The battery lasts me about a week of commutes, so it is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, the controller is responsive and it works
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, the controller is responsive and it works, the D pad is kind of hard but is not a deal breaker for me ,the cellphone holder feels kind of flimsy when you close it, but once it is open it is very sturdy, the clip is very strong , your phone will stay in place. It might take some time for you to get use to the controller layout L2/R2 are in a weird position. So far I am a satisfied costumer. (Better than those garbage gamesir controllers) I will update my review a few months from now or if I noticed any failures.
customer_reviews.author: N3-C45

customer_reviews.title: Great for android native gaming as well as emulation!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this too have a more genuine experience with my emulated game library. Most notably have been playing alot of PSP titles that would otherwise take hours of custom button interface changes as with many games the on screem controls often have limitations that you run knto as you progress through a game. With this nifty controller I literally paired and played with PPSSPP Gold. The buttons were mapped automatically to my surprise without mistake. I did happen to run an analog stick test and this controller hit every axis point consistently without any hangups. I haven't experienced any notable lag due to'the connection yet either. Overall a great product for someone who plays games heavily on their mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Strozeski

customer_reviews.title: Bottom buttons are weird
customer_reviews.text: I really like the build quality and also there seems to be little to no lag in between the controller and the phone. The only thing I don't like about this controller is the two buttons at the bottom. It look cool in the pictures but when using that it's not as fun or as easy as it looks. It takes some getting used to and also it works very well if you have big hands. Or long Grinch like fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Eleuterio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this controller some time ago and after trying I just let it sit because it was so uncomfortable and felt so cheap. Decided to give it another try now and was reminded why I didn't use it. Materials were bad, buttons were uncomfortable to press and not smooth at all. The Joystick would constantly get stuck moving to the left.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Saba

customer_reviews.title: games play great, many games play fine first time without touching ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it much, so I can't comment on durability, but the rest of it gets 5 stars from me. Bluetooth connects no problem on my Note 3, games play great, many games play fine first time without touching any settings, I've tried some google app games, and PSP emulator. The back buttons might work well for some depending on your grip position and hand size.
customer_reviews.author: killua zoldyck

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, does not have multiple controller lay out presets.
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well, I'm just not giving it the five star rating it deserves because the developers refuse to update the app the controller uses to have multiple presets because "it'd be too confusing" even though as far as I can see it'd only improve the device, especially since all the buttons on the app can have their settings changed so having to recreate your old preset every time you wanna play a game and then go back to the one you were playing earlier can be very tedious, though if you are only using this for one app I guess it's perfect, though who would buy a physical device for one app game?
customer_reviews.author: Yehoshua Winter-Card

customer_reviews.title: welcome to McDonald's how may I serve you. Umm I'll have a kids meal
customer_reviews.text: my butt has the ability to crap out a better controller then this. This thing felt like it came out of a McDonald's kids meal and sure operated no differently. Absolutely horrible button input and button not working properly. Was returned a long time ago but I figured I'd review it
customer_reviews.author: Byleth Xoren

customer_reviews.title: Fits my S10 +
customer_reviews.text: Need to take off the case but it fits and works great with every game I played so far!!! Worth it all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dangioffre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!!!!!!!!! I never seen a most comfortable controller.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect controller for android. This product is surely premium build quality, the controller is comfortable and it works with all of my games. The only thing I have problem with is that in the product descroption it says that it can be compatible qith 9 inch tablet when obvisiouly that isn't true. So I could only fit it in my phone that was 5 inch and not my tablet but other than that it is great product. I love the product it is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roger B.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive android controller.
customer_reviews.text: Controls are responsive and clicky, the L2 and R2 button placement in the middle of the back is a bit weird but it's hardly a deal-breaker. the hinge thing that folds up doesn't stay closed very well, Feels a bit cheap but it's about what I was expecting. If you use it like a Nintendo DS with your phone in the holster it has for it, your phone's probably gonna be a lot heavier than the controller is.. Especially with a case. This however is not the controller's fault. It's wireless so just set your phone nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get the authentic one.
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great product if they did not send me a cheap reproduction from a 3rd party seller. I was expecting to get the actual product as seen in the images from when I was purchasing it and instead I was sent a knock off that was missing a button and a key function to the controller itself. It was supposed to have two modes but it was missing the switch that would enable bluetooth control as opposed to touch screen. Huge bummer. Then, I had to go through the return process twice thinking they would send what I wanted. It did not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost good, except for one glaring issue.
customer_reviews.text: Intially the controller configuring took a bit of time to figure out. The controller software is pretty poor at best. None of the preloaded games presets are poor. After a few weeks the controller began to display a strange drifting problem which makes it nearly impossible to play anything. I'm not sure how to fix this besides resetting the controller continually. Overall,it showed promise that it ultimately could not live up to.
customer_reviews.author: Vagabondjonez

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until I switched phones
customer_reviews.text: I loved this on my s7. Comfortable to hold, my hands don't fall asleep and my phone rests in it securely but I recently I switched to an s10 and it no longer works! I'm so sad it won't pair with my s10. Utterly heart broken... how to play my games now
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C

customer_reviews.title: Most solid Phone controller for anywhere near its price range
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these a year or two ago and it's just as solid as I remember. For the price I find it hard to beat for phone gaming. Solid, durable, surprisingly good battery life for a BT controller and no hassle setting it up. It will make my boring graveyard shifts bareable to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The Nexus 6 is too large to fit in the holder with a case. Not all games or emulators have full functionality. The ones that do though this thing works wonderfully. The start button is at a bad spot, but I love this lil thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: Great but not compatible with all games.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, especially for the price. I highly recommend checking what games are compatible with it. I had to learn this the hard way after I bought it. Was hoping it would work with a certain game but it didn't. Overall, pretty decent and cool controller.
customer_reviews.author: Pick-E

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm in everything I have used it with
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm in everything I have used it with, Dolphin in a Mac, and all in an Android, the only thing would be with Mupen 64 and that is all software fault (incomplete mapping). This is the best controller
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ipiña

customer_reviews.title: Constant disconnects
customer_reviews.text: Battery life was horrible. It would work fine for 5-10 minutes then constantly disconnect. It smelled slightly like burning after the first charge. I returned after a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: M Dunkin

customer_reviews.title: OMG LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had time for more games. Truth is that I'm working full time, in school full time, and middle age is right around the corner. I like to play some older favorites when I have time. Final Fantasy VI on my phone is so convenient, but the controls are awful. With this, it's absolutely fun and easy, just like it was on the original SNES!
customer_reviews.author: Annie A.

customer_reviews.title: Works well with emulators (see update)
customer_reviews.text: I us this on breaks and during lunch, with a 2 year old at home this is how I game. The controller works well, though the d-pad is stiff and slow to respond some times. Update: Right analog stick will not register left or right anymore after 6 months, I'd understand you get what you pay for but I was hoping it would last at least at year. Update2: Contacted BEBONCOOL and they're sending a replacement after some discussion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Works with surtin games, Minecraft works not pubg mobile, doesn't work for PC or any consoles, connecting it to you're phone is a pain, battery is crap but I like the layout wish it could be better but for now this is my review
customer_reviews.author: cayleigh r.

customer_reviews.title: and thats just the hardware the soft ware is worse. there is little to no android support there ...
customer_reviews.text: oh where to begin? the game pad is low quality everything is cheap chinese plastic, and thats just the hardware the soft ware is worse. there is little to no android support there app looks like it was programmed on a commador 64 and never updated since its unfortunate birth; half the keys arent mapped, there are no options to map or remap keys and there are no clear instructions on how to operate the keys that do work. nothing about this controller is ergonomic, intuitive, sensible, noteworthy or intelligence it was cobbled together to be a cheap cash grab. save yourself the trouble and money and DONT BUY THIS.....god what a letdown....hate it..ssooooooo much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my emulators on my Samsung galaxy s10e. It did not connect. And when it did none of the buttons were working properly. When I downloaded the app for it it made it worse. I could not key map anything. I do not reccomend this controller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can play games on your phone with this.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for Android phones. I'm using this as a controller for my N64 emulator. Tweaking controls is not necessary. Works perfectly after you pair it the first time. It also comes with a reference in the Play Store where you can download more free games that are compatible with this controller.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Durability and Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is definitely a very good controller for the phone. Had it a month and a half, use it everyday... Take it to work and I work construction so it gets a lil wear and still works perfectly. Battery has never completely died, great life... I'd buy again and recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Digital

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: It works quite fine on my Morotola Moto G5S Plus, but it's not perfect. For one, the clip mechanism doesn't allow for the phone to be centered, as if it was, it would be actively crushing the power button. And secondly, and most importantly, there is some input lag. However, that's kind of a thing with all Bluetooth input devices? But it's still inexcusable for when I wanted to use this with action games and emulators. (Also, it doesn't play nice with emulators, but that might be the fault of the author of all those emulator ports to Android...)
customer_reviews.author: Chris Trumbour

customer_reviews.title: Decent controller, doesn't hold a charge at all.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough no issues with the connections, however it does not hold a charge at all. If it is not plugged in it will die overnight without any use. Which doesn't really make any sense.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sorry this is bad quality dont work with critical ops and other games dont compatible games that's why. Dont good games very uncomfortable. Very sorry you need must joystick all compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Works well but a bit small for people with big hands
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried at first as it said on the decription that it was not recommended for a sony experia I use an xa1 ultra and have tried using a ps4 controler on my phone with very laggy results. After using to product I'm happy to report it worked on my phone with no issues. The reasons thus sits at a 4 stars is that the dpad is a little mushy and the controler grips are a tad small for my big hands but did not ruin my time using it so I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Excellect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for slower emulsions such as poké*** games. Lags when playing more precise games like Tony Hawk. Has real/mapable L3 and R3. I do have to take my hardshell off my phone to make it fit, so those with larger phones beware. I've also used it with my tablet, no issues, other than figuring out how to pair the game pad to a new device. My fix was forgetting the connections from my devices, then establish a new connection. Works every time now. Battery has lasted 3-4 hrs of N64 game time. Around 5 hrs for GB/GBA games.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Schultz II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device, feels great and works like a charm. A little piece of advice: it works perfectly with retro console emulators. Right now I'm playing DraStic (Nintendo DS) on a Sony Xperia E5, and no complaints. Of course: not all the games from google play would be compatible with this controller. And another thing: it wouldn't be "pair-and-it-will-download-the-games-for-you" kind of thing. I wanted to play retro games on an android phone, and this controller is the perfect solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Capellan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product, works well, keeps a teenager content
customer_reviews.text: My son (14) uses this and I thought he was crazy when he bought it ... but he loves it. He's had it for quite some time and it's held up well, and he enjoys having it in the car when we take longer trips. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, but seems fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well. Minimal lag, to the point of not noticing, or non at all. Battery life is excellent, and lasts longer than I expected. The apps it recommends are not so great. The game library is unimpressive, but the button mapping app works well. Not expensive, so not perfect, but worth the money. Feels fragile though, very light. I recommend treating it well.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Reavely

customer_reviews.title: Only works with certain games
customer_reviews.text: The controller is a nice size to make it easy to take with you. Thought it would work with all games on the phone but only works with certain games from Google play or you have to have the Beboncool app. Other than that the product works well and is easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Diggermom22

customer_reviews.title: Nice gamepad, fun and small
customer_reviews.text: Use it with phone and tablet. Just right size for large hands. Connects easily and thier app points to apps that they know work with it. Battery lasts a long time. Love riptide g2, didn't work with original riptide. Beach buggy blitz is great and yet to try others.
customer_reviews.author: Todd F. FAIR, HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: They should be more specific when offering this control.
customer_reviews.text: It only works if the application is downloaded, otherwise it is useless on the phone. the games that have the app are bad most. 25 dollars in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Zury

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to hold, small but noticeable delay with input. Not fit for fighting games but still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Rave

customer_reviews.title: This item is fantastic..
customer_reviews.text: This item is fantastic.... i didn't know what to expect from a piece of plastic but, it exceeded them. 1. It turned my android phone direcrly into a handheld for old gaming systems. 2. The battery life is just.. phenomenal, i charged it one time and got over 60 hours of gameplay out of it.. still waiting for it to die so i can recharge it lol. 3. No batteries, rechargable. 4. No wires! Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyukai

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy but works good.
customer_reviews.text: Treat it nicely and it should last. Working great with most emulators. UPDATE: Still working fine so giving it 5 stars now
customer_reviews.author: L. Gabriel G.

customer_reviews.title: Compact and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact design with decent buttons. Great for playing racing games and old games that are just easier with a controller rather than using the touchscreen controls.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% happy with this product the battery life is insanely crazy i havent charged it in 4 weeks ( i am not lying ) also i love the fact that you can use it as a cursor for your phone or even computer i have tried so many games i recomene real racing or Grand theft Auto San Adreas or even Modern Combat 5 this is the best thing money can buy
customer_reviews.author: Joeychaseschecks

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. The previous style controller was better. Doesn't even pair properly to games.
customer_reviews.author: Kaine

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: This controller sucks. Took forever to pair to phone. Directions were poorly written to pair. Once i finally got it paired, the controller doesnt work for my main games, ex: PUB G. Ill be returning this crap product tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: This controller is such a great idea, and I really enjoy using it. I only gave three stars because it keeps disconnecting mid game, and it's really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't configure this
customer_reviews.text: The controller works great and seems good quality but not being able to configure the buttons is lame, as well as only working on certain games. I don't know why you would lock down a controller so much. Also the buttons it does assign for some games make no sense and ruin gameplay
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Awkward set up, but overall a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty solid controller. I wish it had a little more weight to it, but is still comfortable to use for hours on end. Battery life is great, would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller  .
customer_reviews.text: Its a very Good controller for my s7 edge . Its not bulky has two joy sticks works very well for the occasional gamer good for Gear Vr too.
customer_reviews.author: LM GOVAN

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Note 8
customer_reviews.text: Works great with Note 8. Can't use both triggers when playing a N64 emulator might be the emulator though can't really tell. Every other type of emulator no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Feels very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Feels very low quality. Buttons are all stiff. Plastic is very thin Can't imagine this thing lasting very long For the price tag I'd put in a little more money for 10x the quality
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but doesn't work with alot of games.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with fortnite or really any fun games. Also the peice to hold your phone doesn't lock.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBenz

customer_reviews.title: Very Reliable for Gamers
customer_reviews.text: I love the controller I can play most of my games on my S7. Although controller does have its flaws. It is not compatible with all games, the holder for the phone is not 100% sturdy. I am satisfied with what it can handle, and also another thing to mention is that it is compatible with a lot of PC games.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great compact controller
customer_reviews.text: Great compact controller. Bluetooth works almost flawlessly, although occasionally I have to turn it off and on to get all the buttons to work properly. For the $20 I paid for it, though, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Winter

customer_reviews.title: Feels super cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie here, while the controller works and connects well, it feels extremely cheap and plastic. It looks good, but it doesn't feel good to hold. You get used to it though, and from there it's pretty straightforward. Great for use with my old Nexus 5.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: +Good fit in the hand +Easy Bluetooth connection +Solid buttons and joysticks (joysticks even have a "press-in" button!) Mixed: +/-Phone clamp works great, unless you want to hold the unit upside down (laying on a bed). It just flops over. I've considered modifying the unit with some snaps and a strap to fix this. +/-This is fairly minor, but while the shoulder buttons are very precise and tactile, they aren't analog. Cons: -None
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Their service has been great working with me. I had a slight hiccup with one of the buttons but the customer service got back to me quickly and resolved my issue. The controller feels great! Been using it with multiple emulators on android.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: A good Investment.
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the best controller right now. And it's cheap. Having the opportunity to to access the touch screen while holding the controller is a plus for fps games especially modern combat and gta san andreas.
customer_reviews.author: Gino39

customer_reviews.title: ... the controller and not under the bumpers otherwise very good clucky buttons
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy except the triggers are on the back of the controller and not under the bumpers otherwise very good clucky buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Travis

customer_reviews.title: The screen that holds the phone is super wobbly. And the D-pad is absolute garbo
customer_reviews.text: The screen that holds the phone is super wobbly. And the D-pad is absolute garbo. But everything else about this controller is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a very good quality controller
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a very good quality controller. It works for any and all android devices. I like that it has a mouse feature to it. It has great reaction time and I like the button placement on it. Especially the trigger buttons. It feels comfortable in your hands and connects very quickly. And the battery life is outstanding. I like this controller
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works but somehow it does not detected my phone or table sometimes
customer_reviews.author: efren  c

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Right joy stick was soldered in wrong. I had to push the stick up and down to go side to side
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine F.

customer_reviews.title: does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: the only thing i would change would be a locking mechanism for when it is holding the phone, so it doesn't flop forward.
customer_reviews.author: brian dentz

customer_reviews.title: Beboncool wireless game
customer_reviews.text: My son had me order this for his phone..I am ASSUMING he lives it no negative feedback
customer_reviews.author: Tamilasami

customer_reviews.title: They work great! Can customize buttons and use joystick or direction ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use with old gaming system emulators on old cell phones. They work great! Can customize buttons and use joystick or direction pad for any games.
customer_reviews.author: Abbe

customer_reviews.title: Start button in weird place
customer_reviews.text: Perfect but the start button is in a weird place
customer_reviews.author: Ozcomz

customer_reviews.title: BEST CONTROLLER EVER!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This controller out performed any of my expectations. I was not aware that you had to configure the buttons on the device; but was easy! The grip is nice and the device is compact enough to take to work and release tension while happily gaming! I will most definitely recommend this device to all of my fellow gamers!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money! The battery life is awesome, it connects to my phone with no problem, and it's unbelievably responsive. No noticable lag and once I connect it, it stays connected. It's so good and comfortable in my hands I literally tried to find a way to use it as my controller for my PS4. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boy, he loves it especially for pocket edition Minecraft.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to VR headsets. Makes any VR experience on a cell phone much easier even with the cheaper VR headsets.
customer_reviews.author: iwritetolearn

customer_reviews.title: Game controller
customer_reviews.text: When I use this controller it doesn't work. When I push the button to jump it doesn't jump. I can't get any of the buttons to do what they're supposed to. If I could find the box I would love to return it for I feel that it was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Not a big gamer, but wanted to try with my phone and some VR and it seemed good. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: EricJM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing to the last detail.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is legit it is amazing it works so well with emulators and games from the game store and the VR I recommend this one hundred percent I have a S7 edge with an OtterBox case and it fits wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Frank P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easily breakable. Doesnt work with all games
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my Gear VR. Totally added a new level to the experience.
customer_reviews.author: TheRoops

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! The trigger buttons are a bit strange but for what it is and what it costs it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: P and A Alter

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing with a pop-up holder for your phone and real joysticks this is at the top of the line and it's small and convenience for holding in a pocket
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: An Android controller that actually works!!!
customer_reviews.text: This one actually works! I tried a few of the more expensive controllers out there for Android, but all of them had issues either pairing with my phone or mapping the controls correctly. I thought that I would be happy with the Moga Pro Power, but unfortunately, I was spending an average of 5-10 mins trying to connect the controller with my device. This BEBONCOOL controller pairs on the first try, and 'ALL' of my games work as expected (example: Dead Trigger 2, N.O.V.A 3, PSP - NES - SNES emulators). The price is definitely fair, especially considering that it's about the only controller that works 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: FluxCapacitor

customer_reviews.title: kind of disappointed, but its ok I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Overall interesting. But the R1/L1 and R2/L2 mappings need to be reversed. the controller feels very cheap like I could accidentally break it if I hold it to hard. I wish that more mobile games had controller support. I dont think this will suit my needs however.
customer_reviews.author: John Balog

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I would like my money back because Your controller reviews said this can work for the app pubg and it does not work I went through many apps and found out they band the app tell someone before they buy it for that app
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Love it but small
customer_reviews.text: Great controller but a bit small for me. I don't exactly have the largest hands by any means and this is a bit small. Really nice quality and function though!
customer_reviews.author: Attritshun

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good. It's lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Mostly good. It's lightweight, which is nice, but feels a little cheap, so I'm worried it could break fairly easily. Connects to my android phone easily, but since the phone has a curved back (Zenfone 2) it doesn't really stay in the clip very easily at all.
customer_reviews.author: BST85

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gear VR
customer_reviews.text: Great for Samsung Gear VR. Bought specifically for play Minecraft VR and it works great. Its the best for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Myranda DiQuirico

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible, my fault. Not returnable, crappy return policy.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not being compatible with my device as it was advertised and arrived after the time I would have had to return it by. I wasted my money. Huge disappointment but I should have known not to buy this type of thing on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Fun when set up
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent once they are set up but is a bit of a hassle to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, especially on PC. Using it on the phone required some pretty clunky butto mapping app. It dose work well once you get that worked out.
customer_reviews.author: patty_hearst

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my son for christmas but I had it delivered to my work so he wouldn't see it. Well it arrived and I got curious if it played emulator games on the cellphone and how well it would be and I mapped PERFECTLY to it. It is very responsive with no lag running PSP and ps1 emulator. Well needless to say my son is not getting this one so I had to order another one. I love this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Langley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Gear Vr and it works fabulously. Virtual reality is fun, being able to interact with it is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent controller!
customer_reviews.text: I use this controller for the DraStic DS emulator on my Samsung Galaxy tab A. It was super easy to connect, there is no lag, and best of all you're not forced to use the d-pad, the joystick works really well with it! The buttons are already mapped to simulate a DS and the battery life is great so far.

customer_reviews.title: Not for mobile shooter types
customer_reviews.text: Unable to configure and app is hard to use. Not much help either

customer_reviews.title: One of the best he's ever had
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this controller! One of the best he's ever had.

customer_reviews.text: Loved my first one it just got submerged in liquid so i bought another one

customer_reviews.title: Nice Game Controller
customer_reviews.text: Beboncool wireless game controller is good but can't work any software game. Only working at Beboncool software games. I learn more it later. I like color blue on it cool.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cool controller, very portable, love the design, I got mine in blue
customer_reviews.author: Rpg lady

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine, 1 minor tweak may be needed.
customer_reviews.text: Controller is great. bluetooth quickly connects, not issues there. The phone grip could be upgraded some, newer large phones slip out very easily.
customer_reviews.author: George Brodie

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: Connected to my phone on my second try, after I read the instructions, and works just fine. The buttons don't have the same feel as a current gen console, but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Peacock

product_meta.title: BEBONCOOL Android Wireless Game Controller with Clip for Android Phone/Tablet/Samsung/Game Boy Emulator, Works with Bluetooth (Blue)
feature_bullets: EASY TO CONNECT -- Wireless connect to any Android cell phone, tablet compatible with Bluetooth 2.0 or higher; Support latest Android version System.

CUSTOM KEY SETTING – Keymapping the games you like. We can play almost popular games like PUBG, It has two joy sticks, a D-pad, home button, start and select buttons, X,Y, A, B buttons and L1, L2, R1, R2 shoulder triggers.

COMPATIBLE DEVICE -- With 3.0 to 5.6 inches of telescopic holder design, compatible with android smartphone Samsung S6, S6 Edge, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, Nexus, HTC, LG G4 G5, Huawei, iPhone. Please note we don't recommend this controller to LG G2/G3/Optimus F7, Sony Xperia T phone.

FREE COMPANION APP -- "BEBONCOOL GAMEPAD" brings you about 300 games (including about 145 free games): https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bebooncool.gamepad. Or you can download any games you like in the market, setup the layout and play with your customized map.

MAKING YOUR CHOICE RIGHT – You get a wireless android controller which built-in lithium rechargeable battery 350mA for 8-10 hours when playing continuously ※※ if you have any question, please have no hesitate to contact with us , We promise that we will do our best to make you 100% satisfied for after-sale service
